}

// NewDNSClient creates a new mock instance
func NewDNSClient(ctrl *gomock.Controller) *DNSClient {
    mock := &DNSClient{ctrl: ctrl}  // 创建 DNSClient 的 mock 实例
    mock.recorder = &DNSClientMockRecorder{mock}  // 创建 DNSClient 的 mock recorder
    return mock
}
